title: Show HN: Gemini Pro 3 hallucinates the HN front page 10 years from now
author: keepamovin
aiHeadline: Time-traveling AI predicts HN front page 10 years into the future, and somehow it's still full of tech debates and cat videos.

title: Ask HN: Should "I asked $AI, and it said" replies be forbidden in HN guidelines?
author: embedding-shape
aiHeadline: Ask HN: Should we ban people from saying 'I asked an AI and it said' because honestly, we're all just parrots now, right?

title: Mistral releases Devstral2 and Mistral Vibe CLI
author: pember
aiHeadline: Mistral drops new AI tools, because clearly the world needs more AI tools, and also because they're apparently the AI overlords now.

title: 10 Years of Let's Encrypt
author: SGran
aiHeadline: Let's Encrypt turns 10, and somehow the internet is still not entirely secure, but at least we have free, automated, and secure certificates now!

title: PeerTube is recognized as a digital public good by Digital Public Goods Alliance
author: fsflover
aiHeadline: PeerTube gets official recognition as a digital public good, proving that sometimes the quiet, under-the-radar platforms are the ones actually changing the world.
